posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: C.F.O. Corey W. Rogerson
Your Steam ID:STEAM_0:0:24225449 
Reason: Exploiting map de_vegas
Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban: 3d ending in three days.
What server were you playing?:TTT
Who banned you?:Gash
Why should we unban you?:

Well i feel that three days is a bit much for the kind of exploiting we were doing, we were just trying to get on this building. then another player shot near me and my first reaction was to shoot him. i killed him and then me and Ryancarson25 roamed around exploring and looking for places to bury him. we said repeatedly tell me if im last inno, ill slay myself. gash then waited for a while to ban us, like 15 minutes. he never warned us, for we'd have stopped. i'm sorry and i didnt realize that i was ruining the game.

This went on for 4 rounds of you guys hiding outside the map, despite many players request for you to stop. During one of these excursions of yours, you 3 were told 5 or so times that you were the last innos, but you were too busy playing launcher to do suicide. I did not mention this to him, since I did not have proof of it, but I gave him these images directly.

1:57 AM - Udane 嘘つき: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044942440119?tab=public http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044942448583?tab=public http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044942451919?tab=public http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044942456533?tab=public
1:57 AM - Udane 嘘つき: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044942461092?tab=public http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044942487863?tab=public
1:57 AM - Udane 嘘つき: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Udane/screenshot/577807044942491445?tab=public
Udane i slayed myself when they told me i was last inno. At most i may not have read chat the minute that they said i was last innocent but i slayed myself when i noticed it

Again, here we are udane. Like i said before.. If you would just say something to me instead of going one ss escapade I'd stop. This is how things turn out ugly. Either way I'm sorry for what I did and it's not going to happen again

I accept my ban, what has been done was done. Despite the fact this is not listed in the MOTD, nor any disclaimer that says admins reserve the right to ban anyone for anything they deem negative to gameplay (Which makes these bans unjustified) I still accept my ban.
are you trollin domeneeto? or are you using politcal satire to justify your case? i honestly cant tell.

No I am being honest, I don't care weather or not I am unbanned, I have done what I've done knowingly. Me, You (Corey) and Ryan have. Although what I did what not to the same extent as the two of you (I only did it for 2-3 rounds) I accept my ban.

>> No I am being honest, I don't care weather or not I am unbanned, I have done what I've done knowingly. Me, You (Corey) and Ryan have. Although what I did what not to the same extent as the two of you (I only did it for 2-3 rounds) I accept my ban. 
 did it about 3 rounds/

>> Ben":20txb4uk]Rule 17 on the rules page.
